title: Bayer CropScience 's revenue 2005 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenues in million euros, containing a total of 14 data points.
In general Revenues in million euros has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Revenues in million euros, about 14266.0 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Revenues in million euros about 5700.0 was reached at Year 2006
